CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Request"), $Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission, $User.Id = OwnerId), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningSelectTemplate?id="&Id & "&action=Generate_Agreement&templateType=Agreement", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Generate", "Generate"),"_self") , HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__SelectTemplate?id="&Id & "&action=Generate_Agreement&templateType=Agreement", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Generate", "Generate"),"_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: Generate_Custom
